content: lion brand pattern # 60230 corrections applied feb 18 2008 skill level easy + level 3 jiffy® article #450 3 colors 4 balls each 12 balls total *caffe paprika chili* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge 2½ clusters of row 1 = 5 in 12 5 cm with 1 strand yarn special stitch cluster work in pattern for 79 row changing color after each row add fringe to finish *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
